     ^1<num>$^.<sent>$	^William<np><ant><m><sg>$ ^*Godwin$ ^be<vbser><pri><p3><sg>$ ^credit<vblex><pp>$ ^as<cnjadv>$ ^one<prn><tn><mf><sg>$ ^of<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^founder<n><pl>$ ^of<pr>$ ^modern<adj>$ ^anarchism<n><sg>$^.<sent>$
     ^2<num>$^.<sent>$	^Anarchism<n><sg>$ ^be<vbser><pri><p3><sg>$ ^not<adv>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^reign<n><sg>$ ^of<pr>$ ^love<n><sg>$^,<cm>$ ^but<cnjcoo>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^reign<n><sg>$ ^of<pr>$ ^justice<n><sg>$^.<sent>$

    ^48<num>$^.<sent>$	^In<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^early<adj><sint><sup>$ ^greek<adj>$ ^*inscriptions$ ^after<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^greek<adj>$ ^Dark<adj><sint>$ ^Age<n><pl>$^,<cm>$ ^date<vblex><ger>$ ^to<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^8<num><ord>$ ^century<n><sg>$ ^*BC$^,<cm>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^letter<n><sg>$ ^rest<n><pl>$ ^upon<pr>$ ^its<det><pos><sp>$ ^side<n><sg>$^,<cm>$ ^but<cnjcoo>$ ^in<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^greek<adj>$ ^alphabet<n><sg>$ ^of<pr>$ ^late<adj><sint><comp>$ ^time<n><pl>$ ^prpers<prn><subj><p3><nt><sg>$ ^generally<adv>$ ^*resembles$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^modern<adj>$ ^capital letter<n><sg>$^,<cm>$ ^although<cnjadv>$ ^many<prn><tn><mf><pl>$ ^local<adj>$ ^variety<n><pl>$ ^can<vaux><pres>$ ^be<vbser><inf>$ ^distinguish<vblex><pp>$ ^by<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^shortening<n><sg>$ ^of<pr>$ ^one<num><sg>$ ^leg<n><sg>$^,<cm>$ ^or<cnjcoo>$ ^by<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^angle<n><sg>$ ^at<pr>$ ^which<det><itg><sp>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^cross<n><sg>$ ^line<n><sg>$ ^be<vbser><pri><p3><sg>$ ^set<vblex><pp>$^.<sent>$

   ^190<num>$^.<sent>$	^Some<prn><tn><mf><pl>$ ^also<adv>$ ^say<vblex><past>$ ^prpers<prn><subj><p3><m><sg>$ ^marry<vblex><past>$ ^*Medea$^,<cm>$ ^and<cnjcoo>$ ^that<cnjsub>$ ^after<cnjadv>$ ^both<prn><tn><mf><pl>$ ^their<det><pos><sp>$ ^death<n><pl>$ ^prpers<prn><subj><p3><mf><pl>$ ^be<vbser><past>$ ^unite<vblex><pp>$ ^in<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^*Elysian$ ^Field<n><pl>$ ^of<pr>$ ^*Hades$ — ^as<pr>$ ^*Hera$ ^promise<vblex><past>$ ^*Thetis$ ^in<pr>$ ^*Apollonius$^'<apos>$ ^*Argonautica$^.<sent>$
   ^191<num>$^.<sent>$	^In<adv>$ ^some<det><qnt><sp>$ ^version<n><pl>$ ^of<pr>$ ^the<det><def><sp>$ ^myth<n><sg>$^,<cm>$ ^*Achilles$ ^have<vblex><pri><p3><sg>$ ^a<det><ind><sg>$ ^relationship<n><sg>$ ^with<pr>$ ^his<det><pos><sp>$ ^captive<adj>$ ^*Briseis$^.<sent>$
